title: Drawing, "Design for Chessboard, Checkmate Prologue", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite, pen and black ink on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, left margin, with pointing arrow: Love's side; right margin, with pointing arrow: Death's side; lower right: Checkmate- Prologue
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Chessboard in graphite supported by a blue and black angular pedestal with base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Chessboard, Checkmate Prologue", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite, pen and black ink on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-283.
